TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class TreeNodeCollection : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeNodeCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class TreeNodeCollection Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class TreeNodeCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 控制項中 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來儲存和管理的集合中的物件控制項。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控制使用中其兩個屬性的類別。The control uses the class in two of its properties. 它會儲存在其根節點屬性和其所選的節點在屬性。It stores its root nodes in the property and its selected nodes in the property. 集合也用於屬性，將子節點 （如果有的話）。The collection is also used for the property to store child nodes (if any). 類別支援數種方式來存取集合中的項目：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用索引子來擷取直接在特定的以零為起始索引位置的物件。Use the indexer to retrieve a object directly at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法，以建立可用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用`foreach`(C#) 或`For Each`(Visual Basic) 逐一查看集合。Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法，將複製到集合的內容物件。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an object. 您可以透過程式設計方式管理透過加入和移除物件。You can programmatically manage the by adding and removing objects. 若要將節點加入至集合，使用或方法。To add nodes to the collection, use the or method. 若要從集合中移除節點，使用， ，或方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , , or method. > [!NOTE] > 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，和集合會自動填入每個繫結，就會發生的時間。When the control is bound to a data source, the and collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs. 集合，繫結之間的任何變更將會遺失。Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost. 若要保留這些變更，請更新資料來源，或是手動重建每次您將繫結的集合。To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind. 包含屬性和方法，可讓您擷取集合本身的相關資訊。The contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要找出集合中有多少項目，使用屬性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果您想要判斷集合是否包含特定物件，請使用方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要取得之索引的物件在集合中，使用方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式將節點加入和移除從。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add nodes to and remove them from a . 請注意，和屬性傳回物件。Notice that the and properties return a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionAdd/CS/treenodecollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionAdd/VB/treenodecollectionaddvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別使用的預設值。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the default values. 這個建構函式通常使用於建立集合的根節點的父節點 （或擁有者） 不需要。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root nodes where a parent node (or owner) is not required. > [!NOTE] > 建立非根節點的集合時，您應該使用多載建構函式採用`owner`參數，而此建構函式，以指定的父節點。When creating a collection of non-root nodes, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent node. 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 物件，表示集合的父節點。

span.span: The object that represents the parent node of the collection.

summary.span: 使用指定的父節點 (或擁有人)，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified parent node (or owner).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的父節點 （或擁有者）。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the specified parent node (or owner). 這個建構函式通常使用於建立集合的非根節點是在您要指定父節點。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of non-root nodes where you need to specify the parent node. > [!NOTE] > 建立集合的根節點時，請考慮使用預設建構函式，因為根節點沒有父節點。When creating a collection of root nodes, consider using the default constructor because root nodes do not have a parent node. 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來建立可以輕易地重複執行透過取得每個項目中的列舉值。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the . 若要取得列舉值中目前指向的項目，請使用屬性。To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the property. 使用方法移至下一個項目。Use the method to move to the next item. 如果您要將列舉值移回集合的開頭，請使用方法。If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 建立列舉值，或使用之後方法，您必須呼叫方法。After you create an enumerator or use the method, you must call the method. 否則，項目會由未定義屬性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. 或者，您也可以使用方法來建立物件可以用來存取集合中的項目。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an object that can be used to access the items in the collection. 另一個替代方式是使用`foreach`或`For Each`結構，以逐一查看集合。Another alternative is to use a `foreach` or `For Each` structure to iterate through the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來建立包含根節點的列舉值控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create an enumerator that contains root nodes of the control. span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.
A that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的同步化的版本，可用以同步處理 （執行緒） 的程式碼。The property provides a synchronized version of the that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code. > [!CAUTION] > 屬性，這個類別一律會傳回`false`，這表示類別不會同步處理 （不安全執行緒）。The property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the class is not synchronized (not thread safe). 同步處理程式碼必須在執行作業物件、 直接依據本身。Synchronizing code must perform operations on the object of the , not directly on the itself. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. > [!NOTE] > 在此實作中傳回的物件是物件用來儲存集合中的物件。The object returned in this implementation is the object used to store the objects in the collection. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 如需有關屬性，請參閱屬性介面。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed
virtual void System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(Array ^ array, int index) = System::Collections::ICollection::CopyTo;

param.name: array
param.span: 以零起始的 物件，接受從 複製來的項目。

span.span: A zero-based object that receives the copied items from the .

param.name: index
param.span: 目標陣列中開始接收複製內容的位置。

span.span: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.

summary.span: 從目標陣列中的指定索引處開始，將 物件中的所有項目複製到相容的一維 中。

span.span: Copies all the items from the object to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index in the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將複製的內容，指定以零為起始物件。Use the method to copy the contents of the into the specified zero-based object. 目標陣列的指定索引處開始複製的項目。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 與物件，您接著可以使用陣列語法來存取中的項目。With the object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the . 或者，您也可以使用方法來建立列舉值，可以用來存取集合中的項目。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，將複製的值到陣列。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the values of a into an array. 請注意，屬性會傳回物件。Notice that the property returns a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo/CS/treenodecollectioncopytocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionCopyTo/VB/treenodecollectioncopytovb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器控制項上呼叫這個方法之後屬性會傳回`true`。After this method has been called on a server control, the property will return `true`.
